# Vandelay

> An always-on AI agent platform built on Agno.

Vandelay gives you a self-hosted AI agent that runs 24/7 with memory, tools, scheduling, and multi-channel access. One command to install, onboard, and start.

## Getting Started

- [Home](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/): Overview, features, quick install
- [Getting Started](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/getting-started/): What is Vandelay, architecture overview
- [Installation](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/getting-started/installation/): Prerequisites, uv install, platform notes
- [Quickstart](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/getting-started/quickstart/): Install → onboard → first message in under 5 minutes

## Concepts

- [Architecture](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/concepts/architecture/): System diagram, component overview, data flow
- [Agents](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/concepts/agents/): Agent lifecycle, workspace files, system prompt assembly
- [Teams](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/concepts/teams/): Supervisor model, specialist delegation, team modes, member config
- [Memory](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/concepts/memory/): Session history, agentic memory, workspace files, SQLite backend
- [Knowledge](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/concepts/knowledge/): RAG pipeline, embedders, ChromaDB vector store, document ingestion
- [Channels](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/concepts/channels/): Terminal, Telegram, WhatsApp, WebSocket — channel-agnostic design
- [Safety](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/concepts/safety/): Safety modes (trust/confirm/tiered), blocked patterns, sandboxing

## Guides

- [Your First Team](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/guides/first-team/): Set up a team with specialist members step by step
- [Custom Tools](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/guides/custom-tool/): Build a toolkit with @tool decorator or Toolkit subclass
- [Telegram Setup](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/guides/telegram-setup/): BotFather → config → webhook → test
- [Google Services](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/guides/google-services/): OAuth setup for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Sheets
- [Scheduling](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/guides/scheduling/): Cron jobs, heartbeat, active hours
- [Agent Templates](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/guides/agent-templates/): 14 starter templates, customization, authoring your own
- [Workspace Files](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/guides/workspace-files/): SOUL.md, USER.md, AGENTS.md, TOOLS.md, HEARTBEAT.md, BOOTSTRAP.md, MEMORY.md

## Tools

- [Tool Catalog](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/tools/): 100+ tools grouped by category with slugs and pricing
- [Built-in Tools](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/tools/built-in/): Shell, File, Python, Camoufox, Scheduler, Notify and other custom toolkits

## CLI Reference

- [Overview](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/): All commands and global options
- [onboard](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/onboard/): Interactive setup wizard
- [start](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/start/): Start server and terminal chat
- [config](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/config/): Interactive configuration editor
- [tools](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/tools/): Enable, disable, list, search tools
- [cron](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/cron/): Manage cron jobs
- [knowledge](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/knowledge/): Manage RAG corpus
- [memory](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/memory/): View and manage agent memory
- [daemon](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/cli/daemon/): Install and manage background daemon

## Configuration

- [Configuration Reference](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/configuration/): Full config.json schema, all settings, environment variables, examples

## Deployment

- [Overview](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/deployment/): Deployment options and architecture
- [VPS Setup](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/deployment/vps/): Ubuntu/Debian install, systemd daemon, Nginx, TLS
- [Security](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/deployment/security/): API keys, JWT, Telegram chat lock, safety modes
- [Troubleshooting](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/deployment/troubleshooting/): Common issues, debugging, logs, FAQ

## Optional

- [Vandelay Expert Reference](https://shaunymca.github.io/vandelay/VandelayExpert.txt): Focused reference for the Vandelay Expert agent — teams, tools, templates, scheduling, custom toolkits
